extendedInfo.description: Itâs an Earth Invasion by Aliens arriving in a UFO. The aliens have come with their spaceship with an appetite to kidnap and probe the Earth.  Protect the girls and cute animals in this fun and challenging game.Large numbers of aliens have descended upon Earth, capturing beautiful girls and cute animals to do experiments. Don't let the aliens succeed in their attempts - help to defend your planet!In the game, aliens fall to the ground from their mother ship to capture our girls and animals. You must stop them before they capture hostages. If you let three aliens escape, you will lose the game. Pay special attention to the girls and animals.  Don't mistakenly kill them, or your game will end much sooner than you want and the people of your planet will be quite disappointed.

reviews.title: Good for little ones
reviews.comment: Trying the rest of the Digisy games now after falling in love with Tumble Eggs
reviews.author: A Google User
